snippet.title: The Blackwell Epiphany - Launch Trailer!
snippet.description:
ALL FIVE Blackwell games are available on the App Store a cost-saving bundle, as well as individual downloads:
 
Five-game Blackwell bundle ($14.99): https://itunes.apple.com/app-bundle/blackwell-bundle/id1080004081
 
Blackwell 1: Legacy ($2.99): https://itunes.apple.com/app/blackwell-1-legacy/id886212870
Blackwell 2: Unbound ($3.99): https://itunes.apple.com/app/blackwell-2-unbound/id888936471
Blackwell 3: Convergence ($3.99): https://itunes.apple.com/app/blackwell-3-convergence/id887173166
Blackwell 4: Deception ($3.99): https://itunes.apple.com/app/blackwell-4-deception/id974092051
Blackwell 5: Epiphany ($3.99): https://itunes.apple.com/app/blackwell-5-epiphany/id1072408580

http://www.rosablackwell.com

A dead man's soul cries out against the force of a ferocious blizzard. He cries for help. He cries for answers. Then he screams as he is torn apart like damp tissue paper.

This wasn't the first time, and it won't be the last.

The police are powerless to stop it, so the duty falls to the only ones who can. What force could be so powerful -- and so malevolent -- that it would destroy the very core of a life in order to get what it wants? Rosa Blackwell and Joey Mallone mean to find out, even if it means risking themselves in the process.

Written by: Dave Gilbert (www.wadjeteyegames.com)
Trailer by: Stacy Davidson (Warbird Games)
Voices: Abe Goldfarb, Rebecca Whittaker, Drea Lorraine
Music by: pond5.com
